entities.name: wood lice
entities.description: The students are asked to gather wood lice and a bowtruckle for study.

entities.name: bowtruckle
entities.description: The students are asked to gather wood lice and a bowtruckle for study.

entities.name: Professor Grubbly-Plank
entities.description: She is teaching the class and is mentioned as being at the trestle table with Harry.

entities.name: Hagrid
entities.description: He is absent from the class, which has happened before according to Professor Grubbly-Plank's attitude.

entities.name: Draco Malfoy
entities.description: He is mentioned as leaning across Harry and seizing a bowtruckle.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: He is the main character in this passage, asking Professor Grubbly-Plank about Hagrid's absence and responding to Malfoy's comment.

relationships.description: Harry asks Professor Grubbly-Plank about Hagrid's absence.
Malfoy makes a comment to Harry, suggesting that Hagrid might be injured.
Harry responds to Malfoy's comment by telling him to shut up.
